lead_paragraph: Seventeen Afghan soldiers training at an Air Force base in Texas disappeared over the last four years; 13 have been accounted for, but 4 remain missing.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

headline.main: Afghan Soldiers Went AWOL in Texas
